name: Divijata
description: A prototype platformer of my first metroidvania genre game, a monk traverse the land in search of balance, just to witness monsters be ressurected before him. I invite you to test it out, its free anyways, or not, its up to you if you wish tu support my work. Im aiming for something bigger, this is just a demo prototype after all, and im in hopes for a metroidvania horror game to develope, but baby steps must be taken first, hope you enjoy this short adventure and find it to your liking, leave some feedback if you can in the way and enjoy the ride.
